Miscellaneous

An essential part of any person's consciousness is his or her ability to maintain a valid and sound philosophy. So let's try to do just that; construct a reasonable and fulfilling philosophy from the ground up. It's a somewhat intimidating undertaking; but it's imperative for every human being to do so. Indeed it is the responsibility of every individual

Let's start with the 'what.' What is my goal? What is my purpose?
